author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two cattle traders were drowned after their two-wheeler plunged into a lake here in Shoolagiri on Sunday night. While one of the bodies was recovered late Sunday night, the other body was recovered in the small hours of Monday. The victims Mahendran (40) of Vaniyambadi in Vellore was visiting Shoolagiri to purchase cattle, along with the second victim Murugan (30), a local hailing from Gabeeranapalli here.

The men while proceeding towards Berigai, lost balance and plunged into Lake Durai here. The lake was filled to the brim in the December rain.

Mahendran and Murugan was caught in a bush fringing the lake. The fire and rescue personnel along with the police conducted search operation and recovered the bodies.
title: Two drown in lake
